roleset.name: emit chiming sound
roleset.note: CHIME-V NOTES: Frames file for 'chime' based on sentences in wsj and automaticexpansion via verbnet. (from chime.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: hardly makes sense
example.text: Lights flickered on and off; plaster dropped from the ceiling, the walls still shook and an evacuation alarm chimed outside.

example.name: boring
example.text: Mark Johnson, the producer of ``Rainman,'' chimes in: ``He has a great ability to hire terrific people and delegate authority...
example.arg: He has a great ability to hire terrific people and delegate authority
